Q: What is a treatment for coronavirus induced lung inflammation, ARDS ?

A: Intravenous steroids. Coronavirus ARDS treatment is similar pneumocystis Carinii treatment 

If patients have signs & symptoms of hypoxia, cxr findings give IV steroids immediately https://t.co/tTOsR366BD
